name: Hollow Denial
flavor_text: "Never forget what is taken from you."

frame.name: Adaptive Frame
frame.description: A well-rounded grip, reliable and sturdy.

perks.description:
Lightly vented barrel.
  •  Greatly controls recoil
  •  Increases handling speed
perks.name: Arrowhead Brake

perks.description:
Stable barrel attachment.
  •  Increases stability
  •  Moderately controls recoil
  •  Slightly decreases handling speed
perks.name: Chambered Compensator

perks.description:
Balanced barrel. 
  •  Slightly increases range and stability
  •  Slightly increases handling speed
perks.name: Corkscrew Rifling

perks.description:
Weighty barrel extension.
  •  Increases range
  •  Decreases handling speed
  •  Moderately controls recoil
perks.name: Extended Barrel

perks.description:
Ultra-light barrel. 
  •  Greatly increases handling speed
  •  Slightly increases stability
perks.name: Fluted Barrel

perks.description:
Barrel optimized for distance.
  •  Greatly increases range
  •  Decreases stability
  •  Slightly decreases handling speed
perks.name: Full Bore

perks.description:
Durable ranged barrel.
  •  Increases range
perks.name: Hammer-Forged Rifling

perks.description:
Barrel optimized for recoil reduction.
  •  Increases stability
perks.name: Polygonal Rifling

perks.description:
Dual strength barrel.
  •  Increases range
  •  Increases stability
perks.name: Smallbore

perks.description:
Strong battery life.
  •  Increases magazine size
perks.name: Enhanced Battery

perks.description:
Large heavy battery.
  •  Greatly increases magazine size
  •  Greatly decreases reload speed
perks.name: Ionized Battery

perks.description:
Constrains recoil for every bolt.
  •  Increases stability
perks.name: Particle Repeater

perks.description:
Distance optimizations.
  •  Increases range
perks.name: Projection Fuse

perks.description:
Lightweight, agile battery.
  •  Increases handling speed
  •  Increases reload speed
perks.name: Light Battery

perks.description:
This weapon has multiple small improvements.
  •  Slightly increases stability
  •  Increases reload speed
  •  Slightly increases range
perks.name: Tactical Battery

perks.description: Aiming this weapon increases its effective range and zoom magnification. Increased projectile velocity while aiming Rocket Launchers, Grenade Launchers, and Bows.
perks.name: Rangefinder

perks.description:
Throwing a grenade or hitting a target with a charged melee grants a stacking bonus to weapon stability, handling, and range.

Using a Super grants maximum stacks.
perks.name: Well-Rounded

perks.description: Increases handling, reload speed, and stability for each fully charged ability.
perks.name: Surplus

perks.description: Aiming this weapon increases its effective range and zoom magnification, and improves handling. Increased projectile velocity while aiming Rocket Launchers, Grenade Launchers, and Bows.
perks.name: Rangefinder

perks.description:
Throwing a grenade or hitting a target with a charged melee grants an improved stacking bonus to weapon stability, handling, and range.

Using a Super grants maximum stacks.
perks.name: Well-Rounded

perks.description: Substantially increases handling, reload speed, and stability for each fully charged ability.
perks.name: Surplus

perks.description: Final blows with this weapon increase accuracy and stability while improving vertical recoil.
perks.name: Heating Up

perks.description: Picking up Heavy ammo also grants ammo to this weapon.
perks.name: Lead from Gold

perks.description: This weapon adapts its damage output and effectiveness against energy shields that don't match the weapon's damage type.
perks.name: Adaptive Munitions

perks.description: Final blows with this weapon increase accuracy and stability while improving vertical recoil for a longer duration.
perks.name: Heating Up

perks.description: Picking up Heavy ammo also grants increased ammo to this weapon.
perks.name: Lead from Gold

perks.description: This weapon adapts its damage output to be more effective against energy shields that don't match its damage type. Improves damage increase.
perks.name: Adaptive Munitions

perks.description: Kills with this weapon generate ability energy. This energy is divided between your uncharged abilities.
perks.name: Wellspring

perks.description: Precision kills create an elemental damage explosion.
perks.name: Dragonfly

perks.description: Rapidly defeating targets triggers health regeneration. Guardians and powerful combatants count as more than one kill.
perks.name: Unrelenting

perks.description: Final blows with this weapon generate an improved amount of ability energy. This energy is divided between your uncharged abilities.
perks.name: Wellspring

perks.description: Rapidly defeating targets triggers health regeneration. Guardians and powerful combatants count as more than one target. Improves handling.
perks.name: Unrelenting

perks.description: This weapon gains increased damage from melee kills and kills with this weapon.
perks.name: Swashbuckler

perks.description: Defeating a Void-debuffed target grants an overshield.
perks.name: Repulsor Brace

perks.description: Kills increase this weapon's damage until it is stowed or reloaded.
perks.name: Killing Tally

perks.description: This weapon gains increased damage for an improved duration from melee final blows and defeating targets with this weapon.
perks.name: Swashbuckler

perks.description: Defeating a Void-debuffed target grants an overshield that lasts for an improved duration.
perks.name: Repulsor Brace

perks.description: Final blows increase this weapon's damage until it is stowed or reloaded. Improves magazine size.
perks.name: Killing Tally

perks.description: Final blows while near multiple combatants or near Nightmares restores health.
perks.name: Extrovert
